creator.description:
Critics are saying:
"deeply fucking unserious labeler"
"cringe fr"
"sad lonely jackass"
"hateful rightwing shrew who can't make friends"
"Moderation as satire has arrived"
"the anti-aging labeller is fun, even though whoever runs it is clearly insane"

locales.description: Ate all my plums that I was keeping in the icebox.
locales.name: Plum Eater

locales.description: This user hates labels and/or labelers
locales.name: Label Hater

locales.description: This user has self-identified as a Jeremy (alternative spellings not accepted)
locales.name: Jeremy

locales.description: This label is for posts with memes that are watermarked or users who consistently watermark their memes.
locales.name: Watermarks Memes

locales.description: Come on dude that's rude as hell.
locales.name: Reposts Without Liking

locales.description: Accounts which may be cryptids posing as humans
locales.name: Possible Cryptid

locales.description: Alt text is great actually but you don’t have to yell at people about it. Also, you’re probably doing it wrong too.
locales.name: Alt-text Scolds

locales.description: Mutual aid is actually fine and good. But capitalism is killing us all, and some of us would prefer not to be reminded of our own experience with poverty when that's all you post.
locales.name: Oops! All Mutual Aid

locales.description: She's not gonna fuck you for being her unpaid marketing intern. You're having a parasocial relationship with women who don't even know you exist.
locales.name: Simping

locales.description: Staring blankly into space, eyes wide, head empty
locales.name: Bad Selfies

locales.description: Individuals who think they deserve respect for being early members of a niche micro-blogging platform.
locales.name: Elder Watch
